translated: ‘What is given?🔽To whom is it given?

original: su zhig sbyin par byed /🔽gang du yongs su bsngo bar bya /
analyzed: su zhig sbyin par byed / gang du yongs su bsngo bar bya /
translated: Who gives?🔽Where is it dedicated?

original: ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar bya /
analyzed: ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar bya /
translated: What is dedicated?

original: gang gis yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang / gang du byin nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de'ang des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang gis yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang / gang du byin nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de'ang des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that thing which is to be dedicated, nor that to which it is dedicated, nor that by which it is dedicated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Because it is empty of emptiness of internal phenomena, empty of emptiness of external phenomena, empty of emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, empty of emptiness of emptiness, and similarly, connect this with each, up to

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: empty of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence.

original: des gang du yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur /🔽ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur /
analyzed: des gang du yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur / ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur /
translated: To what would it be dedicated?🔽What would be dedicated?

original: gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur zhes de ltar mthong ste /
analyzed: gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur zhes de ltar mthong ste /
translated: By what would it be dedicated?

original: de ltar yongs su bsngos na /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngos na /
translated: When it is dedicated in that way,

original: legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin te /
analyzed: legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin te /
translated: it is dedicated well.

original: de ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: It is the full accomplishment of the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa @77b bdun gyi bar dag dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa @77b bdun gyi bar dag dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, up to the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: the signless, and the wishless meditative stabilizations, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rnam par smin pa'ang 'dzin par mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'ang 'dzin par mi byed do //
translated: and it is not the taking up of a maturation.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ni yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ni yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, the gods of the Paranirmitavaśavartin class have all the perfect requisites, which are accomplished merely by their wishing.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the perfect requisites of the bodhisattva great being are accomplished merely by his wishing.

original: des yo byad phun sum tshogs pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed la /
analyzed: des yo byad phun sum tshogs pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed la /
translated: With those perfect requisites, he serves the lord buddhas,

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byed do //
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byed do //
translated: and he satisfies the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: des sems can de dag sbyin pas bsdus nas thabs la mkhas pas thag pa gsum la 'god par byed do //
analyzed: des sems can de dag sbyin pas bsdus nas thabs la mkhas pas thag pa gsum la 'god par byed do //
translated: Having attracted those beings with generosity, he establishes them in the three vehicles.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In this way, the perfection of generosity is completed.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings complete the perfection of morality?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs @78a *//🔽par byed de /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs @78a *// par byed de /
translated: complete the perfection of morality.

original: des 'phags pa zag pa med pa lam du gtogs pa chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des 'phags pa zag pa med pa lam du gtogs pa chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They attain the morality of noble beings that is uncontaminated, included in the path, and attained through the nature of things.

original: de'i tshul khrims de'ang ma nyams shing skyon med la ma 'dres pa dang / ma 'chol ba dang / dbang 'byor pa dang / nag nog med pa dang / shin tu rdzogs pa dang / mkhas pas bsngags pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshul khrims de'ang ma nyams shing skyon med la ma 'dres pa dang / ma 'chol ba dang / dbang 'byor pa dang / nag nog med pa dang / shin tu rdzogs pa dang / mkhas pas bsngags pa yin no //
translated: That morality of theirs is unimpaired, faultless, unadulterated, unalloyed, mastered, unblemished, and completely perfect, and is praised by the wise.

original: de tshul khrims des chos gang dag la'ang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed de /
analyzed: de tshul khrims des chos gang dag la'ang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed de /
translated: Through that morality, they do not grasp at any dharma as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at form,

original: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am /
translated: feeling,

original: 'du shes sam /
analyzed: 'du shes sam /
translated: perception,

original: 'du byed rnams sam /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams sam /
translated: volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: or consciousness as supreme.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sam /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sam /
translated: They do not grasp at the thirty-two major marks of a great man as supreme.

original: rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
analyzed: rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
translated: They do not grasp at the kṣatriya class as supreme.

original: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
translated: They do not grasp at the brahmin class as supreme.

original: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
translated: They do not grasp at the householder class as supreme.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am /
translated: They do not grasp at the Cāturmahā­rājika gods as supreme.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'am /🔽'thab bral ba'am /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'am / 'thab bral ba'am /
translated: They do not grasp at the Trāyastriṃśa gods as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at the Yāma gods as supreme.

original: dga' ldan nam /🔽'phrul dga'am / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam /
analyzed: dga' ldan nam / 'phrul dga'am / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam /
translated: They do not grasp at the Tuṣita gods as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at the Nirmāṇarati gods as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods as supreme.

original: tshangs ris sam /🔽tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'am /
analyzed: tshangs ris sam / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'am /
translated: They do not grasp at the Brahmakāyika gods as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at the Brahmapurohita gods as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at the Brahmapārṣadya gods as supreme.

original: tshangs 'khor ram 'od chung ngam /🔽tshad med 'od dam /
analyzed: tshangs 'khor ram 'od chung ngam / tshad med 'od dam /
translated: They do not grasp at the Parīttābha gods as supreme.

original: 'od gsal lam /🔽dge chung ngam /🔽tshad med dge'am /
analyzed: 'od gsal lam / dge chung ngam / tshad med dge'am /
translated: They do not grasp at the Apramāṇābha gods as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at the Ābhāsvara gods as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at the Parīttaśubha gods as supreme.🔽They do not grasp at the Apramāṇaśubha gods as supreme.

original: dge rgyas sam /
analyzed: dge rgyas sam /
translated: They do not grasp at the Śubhakṛtsna gods as supreme.

original: 'bras bu che ba'am /
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'am /
translated: They do not grasp at the Bṛhatphala gods as supreme.

original: 'du shes med pa'i sems can nam /
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'i sems can nam /
translated: They do not grasp at the asaṃjñisattva gods as supreme.

original: mi che ba'am /🔽mig dung ba'am /
analyzed: mi che ba'am / mig dung ba'am /
translated: the Heaven of the Thirty-three,🔽the Heaven Free from Strife,🔽the Heaven of Joy,

original: gya nom snang ngam /🔽shin tu mthong ngam /🔽'og min nam /
analyzed: gya nom snang ngam / shin tu mthong ngam / 'og min nam /
translated: the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations,🔽the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam /
translated: the Sphere of Infinite Space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dam /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dam /
translated: the Sphere of Infinite Consciousness,

original: ci'ang med pa'i skye @78b mched dam /🔽'du shes med /
analyzed: ci'ang med pa'i skye @78b mched dam / 'du shes med /
translated: the Sphere of Nothingness,

original: 'du shes med min skye mched dam /
analyzed: 'du shes med min skye mched dam /
translated: the Sphere of Neither Perception nor Non-perception,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the fruit of entering the stream,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,🔽the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
translated: the fruit of arhatship,

original: rang byang chub bam /🔽'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dam /
analyzed: rang byang chub bam / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dam /
translated: the fruit of individual enlightenment,🔽or even a universal monarch’s kingdom

original: rgyal srid la dbang byed pa la'ang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed de /
analyzed: rgyal srid la dbang byed pa la'ang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed de /
translated: or the dominion of a universal monarch.

original: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas; mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / gnyis su med pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed kyi /
analyzed: gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas; mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / gnyis su med pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed kyi /
translated: Otherwise, having made it common to all sentient beings, he dedicates it to the knowledge of all aspects by way of worldly convention, without signs, without reference points, and without duality.

original: don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: But not ultimately.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dang / thabs la mkhas pa des bsam gtan bzhi ro myang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bskyed par byed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dang / thabs la mkhas pa des bsam gtan bzhi ro myang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bskyed par byed do //
translated: By means of that perfection of morality that is complete and that skillful means, he generates the four concentrations without relishing them.

original: lha'i mig rnam par smin pa las byung ba gang gis /🔽shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te /
analyzed: lha'i mig rnam par smin pa las byung ba gang gis / shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te /
translated: By means of the divine eye that arises from the ripening of karma,🔽he sees the blessed buddhas who are present in the eastern direction

original: 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag mthong la /
analyzed: 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag mthong la /
translated: and are living there.

original: de'i mthong ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na /
analyzed: de'i mthong ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na /
translated: And that vision of theirs will not be lost until they fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang mthong la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang mthong la /
translated: And they will see the blessed buddhas who dwell, are alive, and abide in the worlds of the east,🔽the south, the west, the north, and the intermediate directions.

original: nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du de'i @79a *//
analyzed: nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du de'i @79a *//
translated: And until they fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood,

original: mthong ba de chud mi za bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i mig mngon par sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: mthong ba de chud mi za bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i mig mngon par sgrub par byed do //
translated: their vision will not be lost, and they will accomplish the divine eye.

original: lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsung ba'i sgra'ang thos te /
analyzed: lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsung ba'i sgra'ang thos te /
translated: And with their divine ear, which surpasses the human ear, they will hear the sounds of the speech of those blessed buddhas.

original: thos pa des nam bdag dang gzhan gyi don ma byas kyi bar du thos pa de chud za bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thos pa des nam bdag dang gzhan gyi don ma byas kyi bar du thos pa de chud za bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as that learning does not benefit oneself and others, it does not perish.

original: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dgongs pa sems kyis shes te /
analyzed: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dgongs pa sems kyis shes te /
translated: By the knowledge of the categories of mind, one knows the thoughts of those Buddhas, the Blessed Ones.

original: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
analyzed: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
translated: By that knowledge of the categories of mind, one benefits sentient beings.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas ni las gang byas pas las de chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi las de ston par byed do //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas ni las gang byas pas las de chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi las de ston par byed do //
translated: By the knowledge of recollecting past lives, one teaches past karma, so that karma that has been done does not perish.

original: zag pa zad pa shes pas ni sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa byed pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du 'god par byed /🔽rang byang chub la 'god par byed /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa shes pas ni sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa byed pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du 'god par byed / rang byang chub la 'god par byed /
translated: By the knowledge of the extinction of defilements, one establishes sentient beings in the fruit of stream-entry up to the fruit of arhatship,🔽one establishes them in pratyekabuddha enlightenment,

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed de /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed de /
translated: and one establishes them in unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: sems can rnams dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la 'jug nus pa de dang de la 'god par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la 'jug nus pa de dang de la 'god par byed do //
translated: and they establish them in whatever wholesome dharmas they are able to engage in.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings, with a mind free from signs, complete the perfection of morality.

original: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa /
translated: The Perfection of Patience

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' @79b sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' @79b sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings complete the perfection of patience in dharmas without signs, without effort, without reference, and without construing anything?

original: de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
translated: From the time they first begin setting their mind out for awakening

original: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can thams cad lhags te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can thams cad lhags te /
translated: until they are seated at the site of awakening, all sentient beings may come and

original: bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas bsnun kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam 'byung ba'i skabs kyang dbye bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas bsnun kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam 'byung ba'i skabs kyang dbye bar mi bya'o //
translated: Even if they are struck with clods of earth, sticks, or weapons, bodhisattva great beings should not give rise to even a single thought of disturbance.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzod pa gnyis bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzod pa gnyis bsgom par bya ste /
translated: “In this regard, bodhisattva great beings should cultivate two kinds of patience.

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?

original: sems can thams cad kyis gshe ba dang / spyo ba dang / bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas bsnun pa gang yin pa bzod par bya ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa bskyed pa gang yin pa'o //🔽de la spyos shing brgyad dam /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis gshe ba dang / spyo ba dang / bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas bsnun pa gang yin pa bzod par bya ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa bskyed pa gang yin pa'o // de la spyos shing brgyad dam /
translated: Patience in enduring whatever all sentient beings may say or do, whether scolding, insulting, striking with clods of earth, sticks, or weapons; and patience in generating the acceptance that phenomena are unborn.🔽“In this regard, if someone should scold or insult you,

original: bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas bsnun na /
analyzed: bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas bsnun na /
translated: or strike you with clods of earth, sticks, or weapons,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar brtag par bya ste /
translated: bodhisattva great beings should reflect as follows:

original: bdag la su zhig gshe zhing brgyad la /
analyzed: bdag la su zhig gshe zhing brgyad la /
translated: ‘Who is scolding and insulting me?

original: bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas bsnun par byed ces des chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog pa na chos rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas bsnun par byed ces des chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog pa na chos rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: When he investigates the essence of phenomena, he does not even observe phenomena,

original: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid lta ga la yod /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid lta ga la yod /
translated: let alone their essence.

original: de de ltar chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems @80a *//🔽te; nga la gcod pa'am /
analyzed: de de ltar chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems @80a *// te; nga la gcod pa'am /
translated: “When he investigates the essence of phenomena in this way, he thinks as follows:🔽‘Who is cutting me?

original: 'bigs pa su yod snyam mo //
analyzed: 'bigs pa su yod snyam mo //
translated: Who is stabbing me?’

original: de de ltar chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog pa na /
analyzed: de de ltar chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog pa na /
translated: “When he investigates the essence of phenomena in this way,

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: he attains receptivity to the nonarising of phenomena.

original: de la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is receptivity to the nonarising of phenomena?

original: nyon mongs pa mi skye ba nyid dang / shes pa gcad du med pa nyid do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa mi skye ba nyid dang / shes pa gcad du med pa nyid do //
translated: It is the nonarising of afflictions and the nonapprehension of consciousness.

original: bzod pa 'di gnyis la gnas nas bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: bzod pa 'di gnyis la gnas nas bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Abiding in these two receptivities, he perfects the four meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
translated: He perfects the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the four establishments of mindfulness, up to the eightfold noble path, the three gates of liberation, the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ma bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ma bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas nas 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas nas 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Abiding in those noble, uncontaminated, supramundane dharmas that are not shared in common with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, he perfects the noble superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas te /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas te /
translated: Having perfected those superknowledges, he abides in those superknowledges.

original: lha'i mig rnam par dag pas shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ngo //
analyzed: lha'i mig rnam par dag pas shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ngo //
translated: With the pure divine eye he sees the blessed buddhas in the eastern direction.

original: mthong nas kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob @80b par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mthong nas kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob @80b par 'gyur te /
translated: Having seen them, he attains the recollection of the Buddha.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rgyun mi chad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;phyogs mtshams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rgyun mi chad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;phyogs mtshams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin no //
translated: Until he fully and completely awakens to unsurpassable, perfect enlightenment, his recollection of the Buddha will be uninterrupted. The same is true for the other directions.

original: lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang gsungs pa de dag thams cad 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang gsungs pa de dag thams cad 'dzin par byed do //
translated: With the divine ear, he hears everything that the blessed buddhas say.

original: bzung nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: bzung nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed de /
translated: Having heard it, he practices accordingly.

original: sems can rnams la'ang de bzhin nyid du chos ston par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams la'ang de bzhin nyid du chos ston par byed do //
translated: He teaches the Dharma accordingly to sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs kyang sems kyis shes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs kyang sems kyis shes so //
translated: He knows the minds of those blessed buddhas.

original: des sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang sems kyis shes te /
analyzed: des sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang sems kyis shes te /
translated: “With that knowledge of the variety of minds, they know the minds of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems shes nas kyang de bzhin nyid du chos ston to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems shes nas kyang de bzhin nyid du chos ston to //
translated: Having known the minds of all sentient beings, they teach the Dharma accordingly.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pas ni sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba shes te /
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pas ni sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba shes te /
translated: “With the knowledge of the recollection of past lives, they know the roots of virtue of those sentient beings.

original: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des dga' bar byed cing yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go /🔽zag pa zad pa shes pas ni sems can de dag theg pa gsum po dag la 'dzud par byed /
analyzed: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des dga' bar byed cing yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go / zag pa zad pa shes pas ni sems can de dag theg pa gsum po dag la 'dzud par byed /
translated: They delight them with those past roots of virtue and cause them to take them up.

original: 'god par byed do //
analyzed: 'god par byed do //
translated: “With the knowledge of the extinction of the outflows, they cause those sentient beings to enter into and be established in the three vehicles.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom with skillful means bring sentient beings to maturity

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byas /🔽sangs rgyas kyi @81a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byas /🔽sangs rgyas kyi @81a *//
translated: and establish them in the three vehicles.

original: zhing yang yongs su dag par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas te /
analyzed: zhing yang yongs su dag par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas te /
translated: having purified the field, having practiced for the knowledge of all modes, having fulfilled the knowledge of all modes,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: having fully known the supreme enlightenment,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro // rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: he will set rolling the wheel of the Dharma.🔽Thus, Subhuti, does the perfection of patience of the Bodhisattva, the great being, become fulfilled in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
translated: How, Subhuti, does the perfection of vigor of the Bodhisattva, the great being, become fulfilled in the perfection of wisdom?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: lus kyi brtson 'grus dang yang ldan la /
analyzed: lus kyi brtson 'grus dang yang ldan la /
translated: are endowed with physical perseverance

original: sems kyi brtson 'grus dang yang ldan te /
analyzed: sems kyi brtson 'grus dang yang ldan te /
translated: and are also endowed with mental perseverance.

original: de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas so //
analyzed: de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas so //
translated: Having entered into the first concentration, they abide.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par zhugs te gnas so //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par zhugs te gnas so //
translated: Having entered into the fourth concentration, they abide.

original: de bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul bya ba du ma dag nyams su myong ste /
analyzed: de bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul bya ba du ma dag nyams su myong ste /
translated: Having entered into the fourth concentration, they experience many kinds of miraculous activity.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la'ang lag pas nyug go /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la'ang lag pas nyug go /
translated: They touch the sun and moon with their hands.

original: de lus kyi brtson @81b 'grus de dang ldan pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag du ma dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la na
analyzed: de lus kyi brtson @81b 'grus de dang ldan pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag du ma dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la na
translated: Endowed with that physical perseverance, in the east, in many hundreds of thousands of world systems, in the presence of the lord buddhas who are there, they go by means of their miraculous powers and ask the lord buddhas questions:

original: bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed do //
analyzed: bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed do //
translated: and with food and drink, and with bedding, seats, medicine for curing the sick, and with necessary utensils.

original: de'i gos dang zhal zas de dag kyang /
analyzed: de'i gos dang zhal zas de dag kyang /
translated: And those clothes and food of theirs

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not be exhausted until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi gos dang / zas kyi bde ba dang ldan par byed do //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi gos dang / zas kyi bde ba dang ldan par byed do //
translated: And after they have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood, they will bring about the happiness of clothes and food for the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: des na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dag la'ang mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dag la'ang mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And after they have passed into nirvāṇa, they will make offerings to their bodily remains.

original: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de nyid kyis song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thes par 'gyur ro; ;ci thos pa rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de nyid kyis song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thes par 'gyur ro; ;ci thos pa rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam
translated: Having gone there by means of that very magical emanation, he will hear the Dharma from those Buddha Bhagavāns, and whatever he hears will not be lost until he fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yang chud za bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang chud za bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: He will never lose it.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed /
translated: He will practice the knowledge of all aspects and will bring beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems @82a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do // rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems @82a *//
translated: He will also take hold of a Buddha-field.

original: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas /
translated: In that way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom, endowed with physical perseverance,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: will complete the perfection of perseverance.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gyi brtson 'grus 'phags pa zag pa med pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gyi brtson 'grus 'phags pa zag pa med pa /
translated: Subhuti: How does the Bodhisattva, the great being, by means of the spiritual practice of the will to enlightenment, which is noble, undefiled, and included among the wings to enlightenment, perfect the perfection of energy?

original: lam dang lam gyi yan lag tu gtogs pa dang ldan pas ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
analyzed: lam dang lam gyi yan lag tu gtogs pa dang ldan pas ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
translated: Subhuti: How does the Bodhisattva, the great being, by means of the spiritual practice of the will to enlightenment, which is noble, undefiled, and included among the wings to enlightenment, perfect the perfection of energy?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: Subhuti: Here the Bodhisattva, the great being, coursing in the perfection of wisdom,

original: lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas lus kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas lus kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed do //
translated: endowed with the energy of body, does not give an opportunity to the unwholesome action of body.

original: ngag gi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed do //
analyzed: ngag gi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not give an opportunity to the unwholesome action of speech.🔽permanent or

original: rtag ces bya ba'am /🔽mi rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: rtag ces bya ba'am / mi rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: impermanent,

original: bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: happy or

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am /🔽bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am / bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: miserable,🔽self or

original: bdag med ces bya ba'am /🔽'dus byas zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya ba'am / 'dus byas zhes bya ba'am /
translated: not self,🔽conditioned or

original: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba'am /
translated: unconditioned,

original: 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the world of sense desire,

original: gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the form realm,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the formless realm,

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the contaminated element,

original: zag pa med pa'i khams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i khams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the uncontaminated element,

original: bsam gtan dang po zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the first concentration,

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar zhes bya ba'am /🔽byams pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar zhes bya ba'am / byams pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: up to the fourth concentration,🔽loving kindness,

original: snying rje zhes bya ba'am /🔽dga' ba zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: snying rje zhes bya ba'am / dga' ba zhes bya ba'am /
translated: compassion,🔽appreciative joy,

original: btang snyoms zhes bya @82b ba'am /
analyzed: btang snyoms zhes bya @82b ba'am /
translated: or equanimity,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ces bya ba'am /🔽'du shes med /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ces bya ba'am / 'du shes med /
translated: the sphere of infinite space,

original: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar zhes bya ba'am /
translated: up to the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya ba'am /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya ba'am / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the right efforts,🔽the bases of supernatural power,

original: dbang po rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: dbang po rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the faculties,

original: stobs rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: stobs rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the branches of enlightenment,🔽or

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the noble eightfold path,

original: stong pa nyid ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ces bya ba'am /
translated: emptiness,🔽signlessness,

original: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'am /🔽smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'am / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: or wishlessness.

original: mi rtag ces bya ba'am /🔽bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya ba'am / bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: up to the buddhadharmas as permanent or impermanent,

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am /🔽bdag yod pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am / bdag yod pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: happy or unhappy,🔽self or not self,

original: bdag med pa zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do //
analyzed: bdag med pa zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do //
translated: or as attractive or unattractive.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am / dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am /
translated: the result of non-returner,🔽the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: rang byang chub ces bya ba'am /
translated: or a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: the stream enterers,

original: rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do //
translated: up to ‘pratyeka­buddha’ and ‘bodhisattva’ are not to be grasped at as supreme.

original: sems can 'di dag ni mthong bas rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni mthong bas rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: ‘These sentient beings are distinguished by their insight.

original: sems can @83a *//
analyzed: sems can @83a *//
translated: These sentient beings

original: 'di dag ni bsrabs pas rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni bsrabs pas rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: are distinguished by their reduction.

original: sems can 'di dag ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pas rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pas rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: These sentient beings are distinguished by their inferior state.

original: 'di dag ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pas rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pas rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: These are distinguished by their superior state.

original: 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: These are distinguished by their state as pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'di dag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: These are distinguished by their state of knowledge of the aspects of the path.’

original: zhes de ltar yang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do //
analyzed: zhes de ltar yang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do //
translated: In this way, they do not grasp at anything as supreme.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar ngo bo nyid gang gis rab tu phye ba'i ngo bo nyid de dag la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar ngo bo nyid gang gis rab tu phye ba'i ngo bo nyid de dag la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because those natures by which they are distinguished do not exist.

original: de sems kyi brtson 'grus de dang ldan pas 'chi khar yang sems can rnams kyi don byed la sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de sems kyi brtson 'grus de dang ldan pas 'chi khar yang sems can rnams kyi don byed la sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so //
translated: Endowed with that mental diligence, at the time of death they will also work for the welfare of sentient beings, and they will not apprehend those sentient beings.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed la /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed la /
translated: They will also perfect the perfection of diligence,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: but they will not apprehend that perfection of diligence.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed la /
translated: They will also perfect the buddhadharmas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so //
translated: but they will not apprehend those buddhadharmas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: They will also purify a buddhafield, but they will not apprehend that buddhafield.

original: de lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus de dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin la /
analyzed: de lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus de dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin la /
translated: Endowed with that physical and mental diligence, they will also embrace all wholesome dharmas,

original: de dag la'ang chags par mi byed de /
analyzed: de dag la'ang chags par mi byed de /
translated: but they will not be attached to them.

original: de chags pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du @83b 'gro zhing /
analyzed: de chags pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du @83b 'gro zhing /
translated: Without being attached, they will go from buddhafield to buddhafield,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste /
translated: He goes from world system to world system.

original: sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /
translated: He benefits sentient beings.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang dang gang rnam par sprul par 'dod pas /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang dang gang rnam par sprul par 'dod pas /
translated: Whatever magical emanations he wishes to emanate,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dang de rnam par sprul par byed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dang de rnam par sprul par byed do //
translated: he emanates those magical emanations.

original: yang na ni me tog gi char 'bebs so //
analyzed: yang na ni me tog gi char 'bebs so //
translated: Or he causes a rain of flowers to fall.

original: yang na ni spos 'gyed par byed do //🔽yang na ni 'brug sgra sgrog par byed do //
analyzed: yang na ni spos 'gyed par byed do // yang na ni 'brug sgra sgrog par byed do //
translated: Or he causes incense to spread.🔽Or he causes thunder to sound.

original: yang na ni glu dbyangs sgrog par byed do //
analyzed: yang na ni glu dbyangs sgrog par byed do //
translated: Or he causes songs to be sung.

original: yang na ni sa g-yo par byed do //
analyzed: yang na ni sa g-yo par byed do //
translated: Or he causes the earth to tremble.

original: yang na ni rin po che sna bdun gyi sa gzhi ston par byed do //
analyzed: yang na ni rin po che sna bdun gyi sa gzhi ston par byed do //
translated: Or he reveals a ground of the seven precious substances.

original: yang na ni mun nag gi sems can rnams kyi ched du bdag nyid las 'od 'byin par byed do //
analyzed: yang na ni mun nag gi sems can rnams kyi ched du bdag nyid las 'od 'byin par byed do //
translated: Or he emits light from his own body for the sake of sentient beings in the dark.

original: yang na ni spos gtong bar byed do //
analyzed: yang na ni spos gtong bar byed do //
translated: Or he spreads incense.

original: yang na ni srog gcod pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed do //
analyzed: yang na ni srog gcod pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed do //
translated: Or he performs a sacrifice of non-killing.

original: yang na ni sems can mtha' yas pa lam la 'dzud par byed do //
analyzed: yang na ni sems can mtha' yas pa lam la 'dzud par byed do //
translated: or else he introduces infinite sentient beings to the path.

original: srog gcod pa las zlog par byed pa nas /
analyzed: srog gcod pa las zlog par byed pa nas /
translated: He turns them away from taking life,

original: log par lta ba'i bar dag las zlog par byed do //
analyzed: log par lta ba'i bar dag las zlog par byed do //
translated: up to and including wrong views.

original: kha cig la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: kha cig la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed do //
translated: He helps some with generosity.

original: kha cig la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: kha cig la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs par byed do //
translated: He helps some with morality.

original: kha cig gi don du ni yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su gtong bar byed do //
analyzed: kha cig gi don du ni yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su gtong bar byed do //
translated: For the sake of some, he gives up his major and minor body parts.

original: kha cig la ni bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong bar byed do //
analyzed: kha cig la ni bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong bar byed do //
translated: For the sake of some, he gives up his children and wife.

original: kha cig la ni rgyal srid /
analyzed: kha cig la ni rgyal srid /
translated: For the sake of some, he gives up his kingdom.

original: kha cig gi don du ni bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar byed de /
analyzed: kha cig gi don du ni bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar byed de /
translated: For the sake of some, he gives up his own life.

original: thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don byar rung ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed @84a *//
analyzed: thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don byar rung ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed @84a *//
translated: With whatever means it is possible to help sentient beings, with that means he helps sentient beings.

original: do;/ rab 'byor /
analyzed: do;/ rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas ming med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la gnas nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas ming med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la gnas nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: endowed with mental perseverance, having stood in dharmas without name and without causal signs, perfects the perfection of perseverance.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: Subhūti, how does the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: ming med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la gnas nas ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
analyzed: ming med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la gnas nas ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
translated: having stood in dharmas without name and without causal signs, perfect the perfection of concentration?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: Subhūti, here the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de /🔽de 'dod pa dag las dben pa /🔽sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /🔽dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de / de 'dod pa dag las dben pa / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa / dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: He perfects all concentrations except for the Tathāgata’s concentration.

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so // bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: “He achieves and remains in the first concentration, which is accompanied by investigation and analysis, and is born of seclusion, and is filled with joy and bliss.🔽He achieves and remains in the second concentration, which is born of concentration of mind, is filled with joy and bliss, and is without investigation and analysis.🔽He achieves and remains in the third concentration, which is filled with one-pointedness of mind, and is without investigation and analysis, joy, and bliss.

original: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i bar gyi sems kyis /
analyzed: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i bar gyi sems kyis /
translated: He achieves and remains in the fourth concentration, which is without pain and without pleasure, and is filled with complete purity of mindfulness and equanimity.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi bar du khyab par bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽'du shes med /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi bar du khyab par bsgrubs te gnas so // 'du shes med /
translated: “He achieves and remains in the station of endless space.🔽He achieves and remains in the station of endless consciousness.🔽He achieves and remains in the station of nothing-at-all.

original: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du bsgrubs @84b te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du bsgrubs @84b te gnas so //
translated: He achieves and remains in the station of neither-perception-nor-non-perception.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de las rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang lugs ma yin par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed do //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de las rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang lugs ma yin par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed do //
translated: From that perfection of meditative stabilization, he enters and arises from the eight liberations in forward and reverse order.🔽He accomplishes and dwells in the nine serial absorptions,🔽the emptiness meditative stabilization,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: the signless meditative stabilization,🔽and the wishless meditative stabilization.🔽He accomplishes and dwells in the meditative stabilization of the absence of production,🔽the meditative stabilization of the absence of attributes,🔽the meditative stabilization of the absence of delight,

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: the meditative stabilization of the summit of existence,🔽the meditative stabilization of the sky treasure,🔽the meditative stabilization of the ocean,🔽the meditative stabilization of the vajra,🔽the meditative stabilization of the jewel crest,🔽the meditative stabilization of the banner of the Dharma,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the Dharma,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the sun,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the moon,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the ocean,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the flame,

original: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: the meditative stabilization of the essence of space,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra jewel,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra crest,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra banner,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra Dharma,

original: mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra hook,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra chain,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra door,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra wheel,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra speech,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra body,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra mind,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra body, speech, and mind,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra body, speech, mind, and wisdom,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra body, speech, mind, wisdom, and action,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra body, speech, mind, wisdom, action, and cause,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra body, speech, mind, wisdom, action, cause, and effect,🔽the meditative stabilization of the essence of the vajra body, speech, mind, wisdom, action, cause, effect, and essence,🔽the meditative stabilization of the

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi nang du ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs rnams 'dus par byas nas /
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi nang du ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs rnams 'dus par byas nas /
translated: Abiding in this perfection of meditative stabilization, by means of the knowledge of the aspects of the path, he causes the collections of meditative stabilization to be included within the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug ste /
analyzed: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug ste /
translated: Having gone beyond the stage of bright insight, the eighth stage, the stage of seeing, the stage of thinning, the stage of separation from passion, the stage of one who has work to do, and the pratyekabuddha stage, he enters into the faultlessness of the bodhisattva.

original: sangs rgyas kyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers of the Buddha.

original: de de dag la spyod kyang bar ma dor 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro //🔽de ting nge 'dzin @85a *//
analyzed: de de dag la spyod kyang bar ma dor 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro // de ting nge 'dzin @85a *//
translated: Although he practices them, he does not attain the fruit in the interval.

original: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
analyzed: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
translated: Abiding in this perfection of meditative stabilization, he goes from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do //
translated: He serves the Blessed Buddhas.

original: de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: And by serving those Blessed Buddhas, he plants wholesome roots in their presence, and he purifies his own Buddha-field.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste /
translated: He goes from world system to world system,

original: sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
translated: and he works for the welfare of living beings.

original: der sems can kha cig la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: der sems can kha cig la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so //
translated: There, he helps some living beings by generosity.

original: kha cig la ni tshul khrims kyis /
analyzed: kha cig la ni tshul khrims kyis /
translated: He helps others by morality.

original: kha cig la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis /
analyzed: kha cig la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis /
translated: He helps others by meditative concentration.

original: kha cig la ni shes rab kyis /
analyzed: kha cig la ni shes rab kyis /
translated: He helps others by wisdom.

original: kha cig la ni rnam par grol bas /
analyzed: kha cig la ni rnam par grol bas /
translated: He helps others by liberation.

original: kha cig la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: kha cig la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so //
translated: He helps others by the vision of the knowledge and seeing of liberation.

original: kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do //
analyzed: kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do //
translated: He establishes some in the fruit of entering the stream.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on up to:

original: kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la 'god do //
analyzed: kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la 'god do //
translated: some in the fruit of a non-returner,🔽some in the fruit of a saint,

original: kha cig ni rang byang chub la 'god do //
analyzed: kha cig ni rang byang chub la 'god do //
translated: and some he establishes in individual enlightenment.

original: dge ba'i chos gang dang gang dag gis sems can rnams 'bogs par 'gyur bde dang de la sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos gang dang gang dag gis sems can rnams 'bogs par 'gyur bde dang de la sbyor bar byed do //
translated: He connects them to whatever wholesome states will purify sentient beings.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgrub par byed do //
translated: “Abiding in this perfection of meditative stabilization, he accomplishes all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He attains the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He attains the clairvoyances that arise from maturation.

original: de nam yang @85b ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de nam yang @85b ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur /
translated: He is never born in the womb.

original: nam yang 'dod pa la bsten par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nam yang 'dod pa la bsten par mi 'gyur /
translated: He never relies on desire.

original: de skye ba gang yang yongs su mi 'dzin pa med la /
analyzed: de skye ba gang yang yongs su mi 'dzin pa med la /
translated: He never takes up any birth.

original: skye ba'i skyon gyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba'i skyon gyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He is not defiled by the faults of birth.

original: de ci'i phyir zhen /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhen /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur legs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur legs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he sees all phenomena as like an illusion.

original: des 'du byed thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas sems can thams cad kyi don byed kyang de la sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: des 'du byed thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas sems can thams cad kyi don byed kyang de la sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: Having understood all conditioned things to be like an illusion, he works for the welfare of all sentient beings, but he does not apprehend either sentient beings or the designation of sentient beings.

original: des chos thams cad mi dmigs pas sems can thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis mi dmigs pa nyid la 'god par byed de /
analyzed: des chos thams cad mi dmigs pas sems can thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis mi dmigs pa nyid la 'god par byed de /
translated: Since he does not apprehend any phenomena, he establishes all sentient beings in the very non-apprehension of the world through worldly convention,

original: don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: but not ultimately.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas /
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas /
translated: Abiding in this perfection of meditative absorption,

original: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod de /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod de /
translated: he practices all the meditative stabilities, liberations, and concentrations.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Until he has completed unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, he is never separated from the perfection of meditative absorption.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Standing in this perfection of meditative stabilization, they accomplish the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de la gnas nas bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed do //
analyzed: de la gnas nas bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed do //
translated: Standing in that, they abandon all propensities and connections.

original: bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas /
analyzed: bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas /
translated: Having abandoned all propensities and connections,

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do //
translated: they accomplish the welfare of self and other.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas pas /🔽lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten @86a *//
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas pas / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten @86a *//
translated: Having accomplished the welfare of self and other,

original: gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: they become a holy field of merit for the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom complete the perfection of the signless meditative stabilization.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /🔽rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos gang yang yod pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na / rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos gang yang yod pa nyid dam /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings complete the perfection of wisdom in dharmas without a causal sign?🔽“Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see any dharma as existent or

original: yongs su grub pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /🔽des gzugs la yod pa nyid dam /
analyzed: yongs su grub pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste / des gzugs la yod pa nyid dam /
translated: as fully established.🔽They do not see form as existent or

original: yongs su grub pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: as fully established.

original: rnam par shes pa'i bar la yod pa nyid dang / yongs su grub pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bar la yod pa nyid dang / yongs su grub pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see consciousness as existent or as fully established.

original: gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the production of form.

original: rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the production of consciousness.

original: des gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la /
analyzed: des gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la /
translated: He does not see the origin of form,🔽and he does not see the origin of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the origin of form,

original: rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: and he does not see the origin of consciousness.

original: gzugs kyi bsags pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi bsags pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the accumulation of form,

original: @86b rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi bsags pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: @86b rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi bsags pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: and he does not see the accumulation of consciousness.

original: de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa thams cad kyi bar gyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa thams cad kyi bar gyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: In the same way, he does not see the origin of all that is with-outflows and without-outflows.

original: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid du mthong ngo //
analyzed: gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid du mthong ngo //
translated: He sees them as empty, vain, false, and without substance.

original: de de ltar rtog pa na gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de de ltar rtog pa na gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs so //
